mapper.insert: insert into comments(commentNo, fbNo, parentCommentNo, commentWriter, comments, secret, replyCount, recordDate, replyDepth, replyNo, modification) values(#{commentNo}, #{fbNo}, 0, #{commentWriter}, #{comments}, #{secret}, 0, now(), 0, 0, false);
mapper.select: select commentNo, fbNo, commentWriter, comments, secret, replyCount, DATE_FORMAT(recordDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') recordDate, replyDepth, modification from comments where fbNo=#{fbNo } and replyDepth=#{replyDepth }
select max(replyNo) from comments where fbNo=#{fbNo } and parentCommentNo=#{parentCommentNo }

choose.when: insert into comments(commentNo, fbNo, parentCommentNo, commentWriter, comments, secret, replyCount, recordDate, replyDepth, commentsID, replyNo, modification ) values(#{commentNo}, #{fbNo}, #{parentCommentNo}, #{commentWriter}, #{comments}, #{secret}, 0, now(), #{replyDepth}, #{commentsID}, #{replyNo}, false)
choose.otherwise: insert into comments(commentNo, fbNo, parentCommentNo, commentWriter, comments, secret, replyCount, recordDate, replyDepth, replyNo, modification ) values(#{commentNo}, #{fbNo}, #{parentCommentNo}, #{commentWriter}, #{comments}, #{secret}, 0, now(), #{replyDepth}, #{replyNo}, false);

choose.when: update comments set replyCount=replyCount+1 where commentNo=#{parentCommentNo }
choose.otherwise: update comments set replyCount=replyCount-1 where commentNo=#{parentCommentNo }

mapper.select: select commentNo, fbNo, parentCommentNo, commentWriter, comments, secret, replyCount, DATE_FORMAT(recordDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') recordDate, replyDepth, replyNo, modification from comments where fbNo=#{fbNo } and parentCommentNo=#{parentCommentNo }
select count(*) from comments where fbNo=#{fbNo } and replyDepth=0
select replyCount from comments where commentNo=#{parentCommentNo }
